note.p: Education: Charterhouse, Surrey; St John's College, Cambridge. BA (1856), MA

Career: Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge (1859); Tutor, St John's College (1868-1876); Goldsmid Professor of Geology and Mineralogy, University College, London (1877-1901); President, British Association (1910-1911); Honorary Canon of Manchester
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB; Charterhouse Miscellany
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1926 vol 99 pp xvii-xxvii, plate, signed by W W W
